__e: She has notions in her head about eternal fidelity, marriage and children.
Now I say give me the girl I love, and I will swear eternal constancy to her, through summer, winter, youth and age.
Don't wait for love with a capital L, Don't wait for eternal fidelity, don't wait, because they don't make you happy!
No matter what you do, you can't change the fact that I believe in the life eternal, as promised to us by Our Lord, Jesus Christ.
Maybe father did see eternal life.
And if we don't eat his flesh or drink his blood we won't inherit eternal life.
She wants me to believe that there really is someone else... to force me into declaring my eternal, undying devotion to her.
You might not have fallen in love before and not believe in eternal love.
I love her, and she loves me. We're in love forever.
- And everlasting light be with him.
We're going to turn on the lights of the world forever.
I'm here now to show you the eternal light.
You start pulling citizens out of the ground that should be enjoying eternal rest and that roomful of patients will disappear...
As long as we keep her company... for a little while longer she can attain eternal peace
He'll finally have eternal peace, inside of me...
You could've asked for eternal youth, Grace, instead of choosing wealth, power, all of this.
They say he made a deal with the devil to live forever... but forgot to ask for eternal youth.
His heart will reanimate my daughter and give her eternal youth.
